Package org.oddjob.scheduling.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TimerStateConverter
    Provides a conversion from a State to an equivalent TimerState.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TimerStateAdapter
    A Stateful that adapts a ParentStates to TimerStates.
    TimerStateChanger
    A StateChanger for TimerStates.
    TimerStateHandler
    Helps timers handle state change.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimerState
    Encapsulate the allowed states for Timers.
